title: Riot why?
body:
Hello riot,
A day i've logged in this account in euw but an error message say:This account as been trasfered in north america.
I have not changed server cause me and my friends are all in euw.
I spend tons of hours in this account, please do something.
I got lag in north america ( i live in italy ) like 150ms.
Thanks.

Danikill3r.

replies.body: We'd like to help you out with this.  Please reach out to us through a [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll assist further.  If you feel that this transfer was unauthorized or due to a compromise, please go over our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help secure your account.  We will respond to your ticket as soon as possible!
